subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Poll
author: SnowfireL@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1250801787
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

God is in my heart, soul, mind, He is my all in all.  I always think  of 
Him, therefore I always do. :) bonnie
 
 
In a message dated 8/20/2009 3:23:21 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
warrior18eii@... writes:

 
 
 
 
I do not and never have.
 
Frank R.


 
____________________________________
 From: mrscaptainjack2  <jjkamp@...>
To:  EVP-ITC@yahoogroups  
Sent: Thursday, August 20, 2009 2:20:41  PM
Subject: [EVP-ITC]  Poll


Can I take a little poll? I'm wondering how many of us are doing some sort  
of protective meditation or prayer before we use the box? (BTW, I am NOT a  
religious person, but I ask for protection anyway.) Also wondering, how 
many  of us have noticed an increase in seemingly psychic abilities or strange  
happenings after starting to use the box?
